[vc_row fullwidth=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1517894092027{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/Confetti-Design-Johannah-Barton-e22.jpg?id=11738) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515478234265{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1517894176135{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

A great testimonial is like a beautiful bunch of flowers, brings value to everyone who sees them.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” row_content_width=”grid” fullwidth=”true” equal_columns=”true”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1517894614280{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”11816″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1519623977566{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1511337593986{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Craft Powerful Client Raves For Your Business With Our

FREE TESTIMONIAL TEMPLATE & COMPETITION DOWNLOAD

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Help your website visitors find out what is amazing about you and your services. Testimonials are a valuable form of social proof that gives your value claims more legitimacy.

In this testimonial sheet you will get:
* 16 core questions to send to clients
* Questions that address potential concerns, barriers to purchase
* The best parts of working with you
* The best placed to put your testimonials for better website ranking

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_js]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJfZm9ybV8zJTIyJTNFJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNFJTNDc2NyaXB0JTIwc3JjJTNEJTIyaHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZjb25mZXR0aWRlc2lnbi5hY3RpdmVob3N0ZWQuY29tJTJGZiUyRmVtYmVkLnBocCUzRmlkJTNEMyUyMiUyMHR5cGUlM0QlMjJ0ZXh0JTJGamF2YXNjcmlwdCUyMiUyMGNoYXJzZXQlM0QlMjJ1dGYtOCUyMiUzRSUzQyUyRnNjcmlwdCUzRQ==[/vc_raw_js][/vc_column][/vc_row]
